trans-unit.source: Provides methods to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來寫入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件或列印佇列。

trans-unit.source: XpsDocumentWriter has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: XpsDocumentWriter 有沒有建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To create an XpsDocumentWriter, use the static <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class or use one of the static <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立 XpsDocumentWriter，使用靜態<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別或使用一種靜態<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>方法的<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>類別。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document or the queue that creates the XpsDocumentWriter becomes the target to which it writes.
trans-unit.target: 文件或建立 XpsDocumentWriter 佇列成為它所寫入的目標。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消目前<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>作業。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: No asynchronous write operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 沒有非同步寫入作業正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>可以寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>物件至文件或列印佇列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>寫入至相同目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>做為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>建立<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>可以寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>物件與<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>到 XPS 文件或列印佇列的設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>寫入至相同目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>做為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>建立<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`documentPrintTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that specifies the default printing preferences for the document sequence.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>指定文件順序的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for each document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>代表每份文件的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that writes <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>的項目<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>設定<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]至目標文件<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別具有單數名稱，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組多份文件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>至目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>中的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>項目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>集來源中的項目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: This Write method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 此寫入方法將 reserialize 指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件會在移除的所有內容<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>，就不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 介紹雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組從<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: 設計此寫入方法不會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: 來源文件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式分頁的內容寫入指定的<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含未分頁的來源資料指標，也包含資料分頁方法。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別具有單數名稱，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組多份文件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> to the set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>集。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A document that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的文件<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別具有單數名稱，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組多份文件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>項目至現有的集。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A set of documents that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一組文件寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A page that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的頁面<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 為批次寫入的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]至目標文件<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 當`notificationLevel`已停用，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>複製序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件的目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>建立<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: 當`notificationLevel`已啟用，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>先還原序列化文件，接下來這，然後將它寫入進度通知的目標為每個頁面都會輸出。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別具有單數名稱，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組多份文件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>來源的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>中的項目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>序列中的項目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`notificationLevel`指定為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>，僅序列化文件，不會列印時，才不會產生通知。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知必須 reserialized 文件。

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: 當 reserialized 文件是從所有內容<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>，就不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)已移除。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 介紹雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組從<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`notificationLevel`指定為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>不 reserialized 文件和延伸的任何內容都會保留下來，即使在列印時。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: 設計此寫入方法不會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: 來源文件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否啟用通知。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以同步方式分頁的內容寫入指定的<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>搭配<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含未分頁的來源資料指標，也包含資料分頁方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for material.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> ，代表資料的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式寫入<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>搭配<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This WriteAsync method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 介紹雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組從<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.target: 設計此 WriteAsync 方法不會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document with notification option to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以非同步方式指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件和通知選項以目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 當`notificationLevel`已停用，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>複製序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件的目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>建立<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: 當`notificationLevel`已啟用，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>先還原序列化文件，接下來這，然後將它寫入進度通知的目標為每個頁面都會輸出。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別具有單數名稱，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組多份文件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>來源的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>目標<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>中的項目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>序列中的項目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`notificationLevel`指定為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>，僅序列化文件，不會列印時，才不會產生通知。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知必須 reserialized 文件。

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: 當 reserialized 文件是從所有內容<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>，就不需要由保留[XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)已移除。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 介紹雷同，也會移除所有延伸模組從<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>標記，包括任何擴充[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`notificationLevel`指定為<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>不 reserialized 文件和延伸的任何內容都會保留下來，即使在列印時。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this WriteAsync method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: 設計此 WriteAsync 方法不會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: 來源文件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否啟用通知。

trans-unit.source: WriteAsync writes a set of documents asynchronously to the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: WriteAsync 將一組文件以非同步方式寫入<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>建立<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The data that is written includes a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的資料包括<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>和呼叫端要傳遞至事件處理常式的其他資訊。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>類別具有單數名稱，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組多份文件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing sequence.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一組<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>項目至現有的順序。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The set of documents to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的文件集。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the set of documents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>表示文件集的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者識別以及物件與非同步作業產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以非同步方式指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>搭配<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The page that is written.
trans-unit.target: 寫入頁面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>表示頁面的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者識別以及物件與非同步作業產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將以非同步方式指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>搭配<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>目標<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For writing multiple <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> elements, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫多個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，請使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>專屬於<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和適用於指定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>寫入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>表示文件的預設列印喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者識別以及物件與非同步作業產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write*> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<> *> 或<> *> 會取消作業。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a write operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: 寫入作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write*> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> method adds a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: 之前發生<> *> 或<> *> 方法會將<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>文件或列印佇列。

trans-unit.source: WritingPrintTicketRequired enables an event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one that is passed to the write operation.
trans-unit.target: WritingPrintTicketRequired 可讓事件處理常式以取代新<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>個傳遞給寫入作業。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: The following four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods do not call the WritingPrintTicketRequired event: - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md XpsDocumentNotificationLevel) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
trans-unit.target: 下列四個<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>方法不會呼叫 WritingPrintTicketRequired 事件:- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>（字串）- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>（String，XpsDocumentNotificationLevel）</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>
